Articles.Content: This may be in the wrong place. While it might need to be in how to, I figure I\'ll ask anyway. Is it possible to modify a capsule so there is only a crew of two on board? For my first EVA mission, I want a 2 man crew and wasn\'t sure if it was possible.

This should be directed either here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13543.0

or possibly here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13533.0
